txt.en:
My dearest Khâsha,

We are about to be boarded, and the captain says there is little hope the Corsairs will spare us. He intends to fight to the last man, and although I have tried to convince the men to throw down their swords and beg for mercy, I fear he will not change his mind. Know that I go to my death thinking only of you. Farewell, my love. I cannot hope this letter will reach you, but it eases my pain to write this last message.

Your Phêlex
